common.footer_text: This is an automated message from Noblivion - Your experiences are precious

account_verification.subject: Verify your Noblivion account
account_verification.verification_message: Thank you for joining Noblivion. To complete your registration, please verify your account using this code:
account_verification.expiry_notice: This verification code will expire in 24 hours.
account_verification.instructions: Enter this code in the verification window to activate your account and start preserving your precious memories.

email_confirmation.subject: Confirm your Noblivion account
email_confirmation.confirmation_message: Thank you for creating an account. Please click the button below to confirm your email address:
email_confirmation.ignore_message: If you did not create an account, you can safely ignore this email.

interview_invitation.subject: You're invited to share memories about {profile_name}
interview_invitation.invitation_message: You've been invited to share memories about {profile_name}. Your experiences and stories are valuable, and we'd love to help preserve them.
interview_invitation.start_message: Simply click the button below to start your interview session:
interview_invitation.expiry_notice: This invitation link will expire on {expiry_date}.
interview_invitation.expectation_2: Share memories at your own pace
interview_invitation.expectation_4: Multiple sessions possible within the 2-week period
interview_invitation.questions_note: Don't hesitate to ask the person who invited you if you have any questions.

expiry_reminder.subject: Reminder: Interview invitation for {profile_name} expires soon
expiry_reminder.reminder_message: This is a friendly reminder about your interview invitation for {profile_name}.
expiry_reminder.expiry_notice: Your interview link will expire on {expiry_date}.
expiry_reminder.action_message: If you haven't had the chance to share your memories yet, we encourage you to do so before the link expires. Your stories and experiences are valuable, and we'd love to help preserve them.
expiry_reminder.extension_note: Need more time? Contact the person who invited you to request an extension.

password_reset.subject: Reset Your Noblivion Password
password_reset.reset_message: We received a request to reset your password. If you didn't make this request, you can safely ignore this email.
password_reset.expiry_notice: This password reset link will expire in 24 hours.
password_reset.manual_url_message: If you're having trouble clicking the button, copy and paste this link into your browser:

waitlist_notification_user.subject: Welcome to the Noblivion Waitlist
waitlist_notification_user.welcome_message: Thank you for your interest in Noblivion. We've added you to our waitlist and will contact you as soon as we're ready to process your request.
waitlist_notification_user.status_message: We'll keep you updated on your position and notify you when it's your turn!
waitlist_notification_user.support_message: If you have any questions in the meantime, feel free to reach out to our support team.
waitlist_notification_user.ignore_message: If you did not request to join our waitlist, you can safely ignore this email.

waitlist_notification_manufacturer.subject: New Waitlist Entry: {user_email}
waitlist_notification_manufacturer.notification_message: A new user has joined the waitlist for Noblivion:
waitlist_notification_manufacturer.process_message: Please process this request according to our standard procedures.

invitation_extended.subject: Your Interview Access Has Been Extended
invitation_extended.header_title: Your Interview Access Has Been Extended
invitation_extended.extension_message: Good news! Your interview access for {profile_name} has been extended.
invitation_extended.continue_message: You can continue sharing memories and stories using the same link:
invitation_extended.value_message: Your contributions are valuable, and we look forward to preserving more of your memories.

print_ready.pdf_ready: Your PDF document has been generated and is ready for download.
print_ready.download_expire: Please note that this download link will expire in 24 hours.
print_ready.ignore_message: If you did not request this PDF, please ignore this email.
